Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>We will protect everyone here with our
unrivaled spear training!
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>If this place falls, it will be as though
Hyrule itself has fallen...<sp:5:0:0> Never! No matter
what, we'll protect it with all that we have!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>You protected the domain. That is why,
this time, we will be the ones doing
the protecting!
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_01>I am sorry... <sp:5:0:0>I have been nothing but
a burden...<sp:5:0:0>ever since <sp:5:0:0>I touched
the sludge...
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Come now! Everyone is so easily excited
by the thrall of these rumors!

Rest assured that King Sidon, Purah,
and the others will take good care of
Princess Zelda!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>This is the very pillar of the search for
Princess Zelda and the investigation of
the Upheaval...<sp:5:0:0>
We will protect it with everything we have!
